member.name: T:DevExtreme.AspNet.Mvc.Builders.AccordionBuilder
member.summary: The Accordion widget contains several panels displayed one under another. These panels can be collapsed or expanded by an end user, which makes this widget very useful for presenting information in a limited amount of space.

member.name: T:DevExtreme.AspNet.Mvc.Builders.FunnelBuilder
member.summary: The Funnel is a widget that visualizes a value at different stages. It helps assess value changes throughout these stages and identify potential issues. The Funnel widget conveys information using different interactive elements (tooltips, labels, legend) and enables you to create not only a funnel, but also a pyramid chart.
